name: Young, Dumb and Broker
description:
Follow the life of a young adult journey to be from being a broke student to the one of the most richest person in the world.

HOW TO PLAY:
Press Up if you think the exchange goes Bigger when the timer runs out (white line)
Press Down if you think the exchange gets Smaller.
Left Bar is your Remaining Money
Right Bar is how much you want to BET
Click the Profile to Buy Anything

CONTROLS:
Mouse Only or Touchscreen

DEV NOTE:
There's no ending to this game, I do normally make one of those, but as being a college student I can't find a time to make it  :(  but anyway don't forget to showoff how rich you are in the comment!

also if you have time give me a sub on youtube Thanks! XD
